title: Morning Routine on Zen Dairy Goats Farm

tasks.task: Wake up and prepare to milk the dairy animal.
subtasks: Greet Bernie and Maisie upon exiting.
Check if Bernie is ready to start milking.
Watch Bernie as she trots towards the milking area.

tasks.task: Prepare cleaning supplies and milk collection.
subtasks: Set up a warm water washcloth.
Use a dry towel to dry the animal after cleaning.
Position the milking cup and begin squeezing.
Collect milk in a blue cup.
Continuously check and manage the milk flow.
Stop milking when the animal is no longer producing milk.
Assess the amount of milk collected after milking.
